reviewText: Meh, it was a disappointing rendition of St. Joan of Arc's life. Skipped very important details of her life and was extremely rushed and short. Had I actually watched the movie before buying this DVD, I wouldn't have gotten it. My young girls love St Joan and they didn't seem impressed with this movie either
a good introduction to Jeanne D'Arc, that will help get kids more interested in the Saints and maybe the parents, this is a real person with a well documented short life.
